StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMedicalExamByID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProspectMedicalExamID uniqueIden..er = NULL AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION CHAR(1) DECLARE @PREVIOUS_VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION CHAR(1) DECLARE @ProspectID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER DEClARE @MedicalExamDate DATETIME
SELECT ProspectMedicalExamID, ProspectID, MedicalExamDate, MedicalExamType, MepsOrganiza.onID, P_GeneralBodyBuild, U_UpperBody, L_LowerBody, H_Hearing,E_Eyes, VisualColor, VisualColorDisposi.on, Le.CorrVisualAcuity, RightCorrVisualAcuity, Le.UncorrVisualAcuity, RightUncorrVisualAcuity, Height, Weight, MedicalDisposi.on, S_MentalPsychological, Consulta.onType, D_Drugs INTO #EXAM_BY_ID FROM USMC.ProspectMedicalExam WHERE ProspectMedicalExamID = @ProspectMedicalExamID ORDER BY MedicalExamDate
SELECT TOP 1 @VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION = VisualColorDisposi.on, @ProspectID = ProspectID, @MedicalExamDate = MedicalExamDate FROM #EXAM_BY_ID
--PER ECP 399 IF MEPCOM returns an X check that there are no previous records --that indicate color disposi.on passed or failed IF @VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION = 'X' OR @VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION IS NULL BEGIN
SELECT @PREVIOUS_VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION = PME.VisualColorDisposi.on FROM USMC.ProspectMedicalExam PME WHERE PME.ProspectID = @ProspectID AND PME.VisualColorDisposi.on is not null AND PME.VisualColorDisposi.on <> 'X' AND PME.MedicalExamDate < @MedicalExamDate ORDER BY PME.MedicalExamDate DESC END
--PER ECP 399 if marine has a Color disposi.on that is P or F from a previous exam --and the current one X or null display previous exam's color disposi.on IF @PREVIOUS_VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION = 'P' OR @PREVIOUS_VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION = 'F' BEGIN
UPDATE #EXAM_BY_ID SET VisualColorDisposi.on = @PREVIOUS_VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION END
SELECT * FROM #EXAM_BY_ID DROP TABLE #EXAM_BY_ID
END
